name: Heroes In VIBE Demo
description:
Welcome to Vibe University, an island university of learning and change! Today, Magnis will go on their first tour with a friend-to-be who's a little too caffeinated to function. Through their time together, Magnis is inspired by Ahlam to one day be an activist, too. And hopefully, activism won't be as exhausting for Magnis.

This project is a production of Tomgirl Studio and was sponsored by ETR through the LIYT program.

You can contact me at: tomgirlstudioproductions@gmail.com
